gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: World Meteorological Organization WMO and Federal Office for Meteorology and Climatology MeteoSwiss

wmdr:Description.wmdr:description: The station was originally registered based on WMO Pub 9 Vol A information containing these observation remarks: SOILTEMP;SOLRA;SUNDUR;TOTRA (see code table A for explanations). These remarks imply the following additional observations that could not be registered automatically: Solar radiation measurements; Total radiation measurements.
